steps.description: Tap the baby's foot and shout to check responsiveness.
Call emergency services immediately if unresponsive.
Check for a pulse using the brachial artery (inside of upper arm).
Place the infant on a firm surface and begin chest compressions using two fingers in the center of the chest.
Give 30 gentle compressions at a depth of 1.5 inches.
Open the airway with a gentle head tilt.
Cover the infant’s mouth and nose with your mouth and give 2 small puffs of air.
Repeat the cycle of 30 compressions and 2 breaths.
